lead_paragraph: TROSS--Lee. We are very saddened by the news that the mother of our esteemed and dear partner, Scott Tross, passed away yesterday. We express our heartfelt sympathy and condolences to Scott and his wife, Evangeline, to their children, Brian and Emily, and to all of the other members of Scott's family. Herrick, Feinstein LLP 1/3
